fields.name: Non-trading (CEPII (2016))
fields.description: A pair in which countries do not trade with one-another.

fields.name: Unilateral trade partnerships (CEPII (2016))
fields.description: A pair in which only one country exports to the other.

fields.name: Bilateral trade partnerships (CEPII (2016))
fields.description: A pair in which both countries export to one-another.
